scMethrix 0.0.0.0001
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reduces a matrix

Source: R/scMethrix_dimensionality.R
reduce_cpgs.Rd

Reduces a matrix

reduce_cpgs(
  scm,
  assay = "score",
  var = "top",
  top_var = 1000,
  na.rm = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

scm

Input scMethrix object
assay

The assay to use. Default is 'score'
var

Choose between random CpG sites ('rand') or most variable CpGs ('top').
top_var

Number of variable CpGs to use. Default 1000 Set it to NULL to use all CpGs (which is not recommended due to memory requirements). This option is mutually exclusive with ranges.
na.rm

Remove NA values
verbose

flag to output messages or not

Value

Reduced matrix

Examples

data('scMethrix_data')
reduce_cpgs(scMethrix_data)

#> Taking top 1000 most variable CpGs for the reduction
